00001 #########################################################################
00002 #
00003 #  Implement the list of known strings
00004 #
00005 package Parser::Context::Strings;
00006 use strict;
00007 our @ISA = qw(Value::Context::Data);
00008 
00009 sub init {
00010   my $self = shift;
00011   $self->{dataName} = 'strings';
00012   $self->{name} = 'string';
00013   $self->{Name} = 'String';
00014   $self->{namePattern} = qr/[\S ]+/;
00015   $self->{tokenType} = 'str';
00016   $self->{precedence} = -5;
00017   $self->{caseInsensitive} = {};
00018 }
00019 
00020 sub update {
00021   my $self = shift;
00022   my @strings = keys %{$self->{caseInsensitive}};
00023   if (@strings) {
00024     my $pattern = '(?i)(?:'.Parser::Context::getPattern(@strings).')';
00025     $self->{patterns} = {$pattern => [$self->{precedence},$self->{tokenType}]};
00026   }
00027   $self->SUPER::update;
00028 }
00029 
00030 sub copy {
00031   my $self = shift; my $orig = shift;
00032   $self->SUPER::copy($orig);
00033   $self->{caseInsensitive} = {%{$orig->{caseInsensitive}}};
00034 }
00035 
00036 sub addToken {
00037   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00038   my $data = $self->{context}{$self->{dataName}}{$token};
00039   return if $data->{hidden};
00040   my $field = (($data->{caseSensitive} || uc($token) eq lc($token)) ? "tokens" : "caseInsensitive");
00041   $self->{$field}{$token} = $self->{tokenType};
00042 }
00043 
00044 sub removeToken {
00045   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00046   my $data = $self->{context}{$self->{dataName}}{$token};
00047   return if $data->{hidden};
00048   my $field = (($data->{caseSensitive} || uc($token) eq lc($token)) ? "tokens" : "caseInsensitive");
00049   delete $self->{$field}{$token};
00050 }
00051 
00052 
00053 #
00054 #  Add upper-case alias for case-insensitive strings
00055 #  (so we can always find their definitions)
00056 #
00057 sub add {
00058   my $self = shift; return if scalar(@_) == 0;
00059   my $data = $self->{context}{$self->{dataName}};
00060   $self->SUPER::add(@_);
00061   my %D = (@_);
00062   foreach my $x (keys %D) {
00063     $data->{uc($x)} = {alias => $x, hidden => 1}
00064       unless $data->{$x}{caseSensitive} || uc($x) eq $x;
00065   }
00066 }
00067 
00068 #
00069 #  Clear the case-insensitive strings
00070 #
00071 sub clear {
00072   my $self = shift;
00073   $self->{caseInsensitive} = {}; $self->{patterns} = {};
00074   $self->SUPER::clear(@_);
00075 }
